lead_paragraph: United States captain Davis Love III gave an indication of his pairings for this week's Ryder Cup by sending out his players for practice on Wednesday in almost identical groups for a second day in a row.

headline.print_headline: Love Gives Early Clues on Ryder Cup Pairings
headline.main: Love Gives Early Clues on Ryder Cup Pairings

snippet: United States captain Davis Love III gave an indication of his pairings for this week's Ryder Cup by sending out his players for practice on Wednesday in almost identical groups for a second day in a row....
